Crap, you're down too chobit? This is disastrous...
Man... I didn't want to re-create my account WE MUST MAKE CHOBIT HAPPY!
Guys, on topic please
this going to take some time

I'll be happy when the forums are once again shiny and returned to their former splendor. Now we can rebuild anew, twice as good as the original!

So, first order of business, does that new version of the main site I posted work for everyone now that it uses HTML5? If so that shall be the new primary home of all PfL data and this thread will become a sort of gateway and feedback section.

Hope to see it up again soon!

The new site is looking great! Helping you rebuild your empire!! (added to rep, posted on thread)

oh man PfL got lost? Well guess I'll help rebuild it (and my post count..) by saying nice things about it

keep trundling on chobit! in the spirit of something grissom said not long before his death, don't stop because of a lost thread. progress must march on.

Shame about the info lost, but anyway is there a new pic?

heh, yeah it was. He once said something along the lines of "if I or any one of us dies, don't stop advancing the exploration of space. we know the risks we're taking, and we're taking them for a reason"

and then of course he died in the apollo one fire. dunno always just liked that quote and thought it was relevant here, with the 'death' of many a thread and member.

wait why don't I just find it:

"If we die we want people to accept it. We are in a risky business, and we hope that if anything happens to us, it will not delay the program. The conquest of space is worth the risk of life."
